translations: n.（剑桥大学）文学士荣誉学位考试；优等考试；优等考试及格者名册

phrs.translation: 优等考试, 考试, 卓普斯公司, 毕业荣誉试
除了提供一般的商学优等学士学位

sentences.sentence: We expected him to be plucked on his tripos.
sentences.translation: 我们预料他在剑桥大学荣誉学位考试中不及格。

sentences.sentence: A system of computer aided pesticide molecular designing based on MATLAB was developed as the complementarity of the software named as TRIPOS.
sentences.translation: 开发了基于MATLAB环境的辅助农药分子设计计算机系统。

sentences.sentence: Ryan says he is looking forward to the small teaching style at Cambridge when he starts studying for an English Tripos later this year - thanks to his scholarship.
sentences.translation: 表示：他期待着在剑桥学习的氛围和方式，他会在今年晚些时候考取英国荣誉学位，也是对这份奖学金的最好回报。
